channel.title: Arrested
channel.description:
I was at the bar last night for my buddies 21st birthday party, and needless to say it didn't end to well. We got a $30 drink special which included domestics, bombs, and mixed drinks for 4 hours, it was pretty much worth it since beers were about $2, bombs are about $3-$4 and mixed are about $4-$5.. So as were getting our drinks the bartender made a couple comments about us not tipping, and honestly we probably gave her about $3 the whole time we were there. She was pretty heavyset and we were all pretty drunk after awhile, so after she made a second comment about us not tipping her I told her to shut her fat ****ing mouth and to do her job. She brings over the manager, he asks me what the problem is, and obviously belligerant I told him that his fat ass waitress was asking for tips, which is something you aren't supposed to do anyways as a bartender/sever.
SO anywho, she gets mad, I tell the manager his bar is a dump and I wanted my money back for the poor service. We start arguing, a bouncer comes over, and puts his hands on my wrist, so I punched him in the face and there was a fight with like 3 of us and a couple of the bouncers. The Cops come and ask me what happened, I told him the bouncer put his hands on me and I punched him for touching me. He put me in cuffs and ask me where I was from, so I told him West Philadelphia born and raised on the playground where I spent most of my days chilling out, maxing and relaxing all cool and all shooting some b-ball outside of school when a couple of guys they were up to no good started making trouble in our neighborhood I got in one little fight and my mom got scared she said your moving in with your auntie and uncle in Bel-Air.

item.title: Arrested
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Break-up

Go back to 4chan

item.title: Arrested

item.description:
@Lin wrote:

How did I know it was gonna end like this… SO original this wasn’t funny at all.

Read full topic

@towriss wrote:

i have no idea how that was funny… but i lol’d like hell

Read full topic

item.title: Arrested
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Lol’d, last time I got cought drinking. Under-age mind you, the cop walked up, shook my hand, grabbed 4 out of my party-brawl (55 cans, not alot of states have it, and thats also an unofficial name), and just walked away. That night, I was driven home by a 6 year-old.

Read full topic

item.title: Arrested
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Wow fail story to tell a cop.

Cool drinking story never the less.

Read full topic
